text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Discourse on ‘Anmeega Jothidam’ by P. A. Ponniah, Railway Colony, 7.30 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: ‘Tiruvasagam’ mutrothal, 7 a.m.; Tiruppugazh recital, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Discourse on ‘Tiruvarutpa’ by M. Vijayaraman, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Sekkizhar Pillaithamizh’ by Arunachalam, Sakthi Velammal Nagar, S, S, Colony, 5 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Fre rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Madurai Kamaraj University: V. Malaimozhi speaks on ‘Socio-linguistic study of fishermen dialect in Tamil Nadu;’ A. Munian presides, Seminar Hall, Department of Linguistics, 2.15 p.m.

Lady Doak College: S. A. Perumal, Editor, Semmalar , delivers 13{+t}{+h}Graham Staines Endowment lecture on ‘Fundamentalism and responsibility of people;’ S. Selva Gomathi of Society for Community Organisation Trust presides, Multimedia Theatre, 11 a.m.

Thiagarajar College: L. Senthil Lakshmi of Tandem Informatics speaks on ‘Android apps development;’ M. Eyini, Principal, presides, Computer Science Lab, 2.15 p.m.

Thiagarajar College of Preceptors: Citizenship training camp; Karpagam and Sivakumar of Thiagarajar College speak on ‘Indian culture,’ Teppakulam, 10 a.m.

Fatima College: K. K. John of Saintgits College of Applied Sciences inaugurates international conference on ‘Changing urban scenario: opportunities and challenges;’ T. Nagarajan of Peking University addresses; Rev. Sr. K. Fatima Mary, Principal, presides, Jubilee Hall, 9.30 a.m.

Mannar Thirumalai Naicker College: Orientation programme on ‘Fire and safety management,’ Moorthy Naidu-Andal Ammal Hall, 12 noon.

SLS MAVMM Ayira Vaisyar College: Fine Arts Club competitions, Kallampatti, 2.30 p.m.

Mangayarkarasi College of Arts and Science for Women: Entrepreneurship development programme, Lakshmi speaks, Paravai, 10 a.m.

Madurai Productivity Council: Productivity Week celebration; paper presentation contests, B. Balakrishnan, vice-president, Quality Circle Forum of India, speaks, TB Road, Mahaboobpalayam, 9.30 a.m.

Nehru Yuva Kendra: District sports tournament to celebrate 125{+t}{+h}birth anniversary of B. R. Ambedkar, MGR Stadium, Race Course, 8 a.m.

Nala Dental Hospital and A. M. Jeyabalan Memorial Trust: Programme on ‘Modern day dental implants and fixed teeth for everyone’ and free dental consultation, Chokkikulam, 11 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, AG Church, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Deep Hospital and Loyola Technical Institute, Gnanaolivupuram, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
